title: Calligraphy with David Graham: Beginner's Italics
brief_description: The word calligraphy comes from the Greek - “beautiful writing”. This ‘how to’ video takes the beginner into the art of handwriting. Choice of pen and paper are discussed as is letter style. Practical exercises develop the budding calligrapher’s skills. Use of colour, and a transcription of a poem offer the viewer the satisfaction of a finished product.
